solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int totalHammingDistance(int[] nums) {--newline--        int total = 0, n = nums.length;--newline--        for (int j=0;j<32;j++) {--newline--            int bitCount = 0;--newline--            for (int i=0;i<n;i++) --newline--                bitCount += (nums[i] >> j) & 1;--newline--            total += bitCount*(n - bitCount);--newline--        }--newline--        return total;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
